item.title: Launching Hugo website on Github
item.description: Publishing a website often requires you to buy a domain name first. A domain name is like having a real estate online. For example, if you bought the domain “yourwebsite.com” you have complete control of what is being published on that domain and its corresponding ‘sub’-URLs, such as “yourwebsite.com/about”. Even though most domain names are not very expensive it can be a bit intimidating to buy one. However, there are alternatives!

Hi, I am happy that you came across this small part of the internet! This website is my small creative side project which I will use to share and collect interesting material. The different topics on this website might seem a bit random, but I have many diverse interests and would not like to limit myself to just covering one of them on this website. The Story behind this website

Book inspirations: Bill Gates book’s tips: https://www.gatesnotes.com/Books Goodreads website to get inspired and motivated to read: https://www.goodreads.com Neural Networks Tutorial Session “Variational Bayes and Beyond: Bayesian Inference for Big Data” from MIT Assistant Professor Tamara Broderick (first 40 min about VAEs): https://www.youtube.com/watch?time_continue=1&v=DYRK0-_K2UU&feature=emb_logo Various lectures about Deep Learning and Bayesian methods from a summer school program called “Deep Bayes”: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wA8UMzhGv7o&list=PLe5rNUydzV9QHe8VDStpU0o8Yp63OecdW
